title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 924.2 - Reports by mail
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 924.2 - Reports by mail

State Regulations

Copies of all reports of accidents occurring in New York

State required to be filed with the Federal Railroad Administration in
compliance with 49 CFR part
225
are to be submitted to the commissioner by mail
to: New York State Department of Transportation

Rail Safety Inspection Section
7A Governor Harriman State Office Campus, Room 630

Albany, NY 12232-0867

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
924.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
